sections.title: Validity of unions
sections.content:
**This page has been archived**

It did not actually reflect current language guarantees and caused frequent confusion.

The old content can be accessed on GitHub.

paragraphs.ucg_validity_of_unions_p2: It did not actually reflect current language guarantees and caused frequent confusion.
paragraphs.ucg_validity_of_unions_p3: The old content can be accessed on GitHub.
